item.title: Porting from ASP.NET to ASP.NET Core: Part 1 - Introduction
item.description: Last week I took to Twitter and asked if anyone of my followers would be interested in a session about .NET Core for developers that are using .NET Framework today. I wasn’t really expecting all that much by sending that tweet, but with a little help from Immo Landwerth who’s on the .NET team, that tweet seemed to have sparked quite a bit of interest in such a session. Perhaps the announcements that ASP.
